entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having died, and Harry has an idea that started with Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has a feeling to go somewhere and track down Horcruxes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as asking Harry what he plans to do next.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul and need to be destroyed.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist who has a piece of his soul in his body.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as someone Harry might meet on his quest.

relationships.description: Harry's idea started with Dumbledore's death.
Harry needs to track down and destroy the Horcruxes.
Harry's ultimate goal is to kill Voldemort.
Harry might meet Severus Snape on his quest.
